Package com.aestus.api.attachment.model

Class Attachment

java.lang.Object
com.aestus.api.attachment.model.Attachment
@Entity(name="attachments") public class Attachment extends Object
The type Attachment represents a file attached to a request.

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected @NotNull(message="createdTimestamp must not be null") LocalDateTime
    createdTimestamp
    The create timestamp of the attachment.
    protected @javax.validation.constraints.NotNull(message="data must not be null") byte[]
    data
    The binary representation of the file.
    protected @NotNull(message="documentId must not be null") Integer
    documentId
    The id of the document the attachment belongs to.
    protected @NotBlank(message="documentType must not be blank") @Size(min=1,max=10,message="documentType must contain between 1 to 10 characters") String
    documentType
    The type of document the file is attached to.
    protected @Size(min=2,max=300,message="fileDesc must contain between 2 to 300 characters") String
    fileDesc
    The file description given by the user.

    fileName
